name: McAfee Web Gateway
description: This app integrates with McAfee Web Gateway to perform contain and correct actions for maintaining lists

base_url.description: Base URL; use port 4712 for https, 4711 for http

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration

actions.verbose:
Either list_title or list_id are required, but the list_id is faster and recommended (if available).

Note: Only adds URL to a list and blocking only occurs if the list is added to a rule on McAfee Web Gateway.

description.description: Description to add to the entry

list_title.description: List Title (either list_title or list_id are required)

list_id.description: List ID (either list_title or list_id are required)

entry_position.description: Position of the list to add the block entry

complex.description: Complex entry, to include a category and specify a protocol

actions.verbose:
Either entry_position or url is required, but the entry_position is faster and recommended (if available).

Note: Only removes URL from a list and unblocking only occurs if the list is assigned to a rule on McAfee Web Gateway.

url.description: URL to unblock (either url or entry_position are required)

entry_position.description: Position of the list entry to remove from the list

list_title.description: List Title (either list_title or list_id are required)

list_id.description: List ID (either list_title or list_id are required)

actions.verbose:
Either list_title or list_id is required, but the list_id is faster and recommended (if available).

Note: Only adds IP to a list and blocking only occurs if the list is added to a rule on McAfee Web Gateway.

list_title.description: List Title (either list_title or list_id are required)

list_id.description: List ID (either list_title or list_id are required)

entry_position.description: Position of the list to add the block entry

complex.description: Complex entry, to include a category and specify a protocol

actions.verbose:
Either entry_position or ip is required, but the entry_position is faster and recommended (if available).

Note: Only removes IP from a list and unblocking only occurs if the list is assigned to a rule on McAfee Web Gateway.

ip.description: IP to unblock (either ip or entry_position are required)

entry_position.description: Position of the list entry to remove from the list

list_title.description: List Title (either list_title or list_id are required)

list_id.description: List ID (either list_title or list_id are required)

actions.verbose:
Either list_title or list_id is required, but the list_id is faster and recommended (if available).

Note: Only adds domain to a list and blocking only occurs if the list is added to a rule on McAfee Web Gateway.

description.description: Description to add to the entry

list_title.description: List Title (either list_title or list_id are required)

list_id.description: List ID (either list_title or list_id are required)

entry_position.description: Position of the list to add the block entry

complex.description: Complex entry, to include a category and specify a protocol

actions.description: Remove a domain from a list
actions.verbose:
Either entry_position or domain is required, but the entry_position is faster and recommended (if available).

Note: Only removes domain from a list and unblocking only occurs if the list is assigned to a rule on McAfee Web Gateway.

domain.description: Domain to unblock (either domain or entry_position are required)

entry_position.description: Position of the list entry to remove from the list

list_title.description: List Title (either list_title or list_id are required)

list_id.description: List ID (either list_title or list_id are required)

actions.description: Add an entry to a list
actions.verbose:
Either list_title or list_id is required, but the list_id is faster and recommended (if available).

Note: Only adds an entry to a list and blocking only occurs if the list is added to a rule on McAfee Web Gateway.

description.description: Description to add to the entry

list_title.description: List Title (either list_title or list_id are required)

list_id.description: List ID (either list_title or list_id are required)

entry_position.description: Position of the list to add the block entry

actions.description: Remove an entry from a list
actions.verbose:
Either entry_position or item are required, but the entry_position is faster and recommended (if available).

Note: Only removes an entry from a list and unblocking only occurs if the list is assigned to a rule on McAfee Web Gateway.

entry.description: Entry to remove (either entry or entry_position are required)

entry_position.description: Position of the list entry to remove from the list

list_title.description: List Title (either list_title or list_id are required)

list_id.description: List ID (either list_title or list_id are required)
